title: Email of Username
body: I have decided to try and find my old LoL account from when I tried League out back in 2012 ish.... now my old email address is apparently registered and everything but whenever I check it for my Username (when I go forgotten username) no email has been received. I unfortunately do not remember what my username was because it was from so long ago and from when I was a young age. Is there any reason why I'm not receiving the email containing my username?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Did you check your "junk" folder? It's possible the email may be in there.

Otherwise you might wish to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) regarding account recovery.
